Prerequisites¶

Hardware Needed¶

Required:

  • Raspberry Pi 4 ~ $43.50

  • Pi2Grover Hat ~ $20

  • MicroSD card ~ $10.30

  • DHT22 (temperature and humidity) sensor ~ $6.47

  • Capacitive soil moisture sensor ~ $5.39

  • Grove - 4 Channel 16 Bit Analog to Digital Converter ~ $17

  • 12v water pump ~ $13

  • Relay ~ $4.31

  • DC Jack and wall plug ~ $12

  • Alligator clips ~ $8

  • Jumper wires ~ $7

  • Grove Universal 4-pin buckled 50cm cable ~ $12

  • Grove 4-pin female jumper to Grove 4 pin conversion cable ~ $11

Optional:

  • LCD screen ~ $12

Total Cost

  • Total cost without LCD: $169.97

  • Total cost with LCD: $181.97

Note: Due to the current semi-conductor shortage, some parts may cost more than usual.
